[Home](./index.md) &gt; [blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [IDragStrategy](./blockly.idragstrategy.md)

## IDragStrategy interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IDragStrategy 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [drag(newLoc, e)](./blockly.idragstrategy.drag.md) | Handles moving elements to the new location, and updating any visuals based on that (e.g connection previews for blocks). |
|  [endDrag(e)](./blockly.idragstrategy.enddrag.md) | Handles any drag cleanup, including e.g. connecting or deleting blocks. |
|  [isMovable()](./blockly.idragstrategy.ismovable.md) | Returns true iff the element is currently movable. |
|  [revertDrag()](./blockly.idragstrategy.revertdrag.md) | Moves the draggable back to where it was at the start of the drag. |
|  [startDrag(e)](./blockly.idragstrategy.startdrag.md) | Handles any drag startup (e.g moving elements to the front of the workspace). |
